Name: adaptive_receptive_field
Title: Adaptive Receptive Field: Dynamic Kernel Size Adjustment for Efficient CNN Training
Experiment: Modify the CNN model to dynamically adjust its convolutional kernel sizes during training, starting with smaller kernels and gradually increasing them. This could potentially lead to faster initial training and better feature extraction at different scales.

Name: layerwise_learning_rates_cnn
Title: Layer-wise Learning Rate Adaptation: Optimizing Training Dynamics in Convolutional Neural Networks
Experiment: Implement layer-wise learning rates for CNNs, where each convolutional layer has its own learning rate. Modify the configure_optimizers function to assign different learning rates to different layers, with deeper layers having lower learning rates. Compare the training dynamics, convergence speed, and final performance with the baseline CNN model.

Name: adaptive_ensembling
Title: Efficient Adaptive Ensembling for Image Classification
Experiment: Implement the proposed adaptive ensembling strategy using EfficientNet-b0 models. Train two models on disjoint datasets, then fine-tune a combination layer to test performance improvements in accuracy and complexity reduction. Test on various benchmark datasets to evaluate generalization.

Name: automatic_multistep_distillation
Title: Automatic Multi-step Distillation for Vision Model Compression
Experiment: Implement the AMD approach by adding the necessary functions for structural pruning, joint optimization, and selection using the NPSD metric. Compare results with baseline distillation methods in terms of accuracy and training time on datasets like CIFAR-10, CIFAR-100, and ImageNet.
